question: What was the ruling period of Sangama Dynasty ?
explanation: The ruling period of Sangama Dynasty was 1336 AD to 1485 AD. In 1336 AD , the Sangama dynasty was founded by Harihara- I and his brother Bukka -I and the last ruler of this dynasty was Praudh Dev Raya who ruled for a very short interval of time before being driven out by Saluva Narasimha Deva Raya in 1485 AD.
